title: Worldweep Custom Content

shardbound.label: Shardbound
shardbound.description: A feat with this trait indicates an ability granted to the Shardbound, and can be placed in your Ancestry Paragon slots.

worldweep.label: Worldweep
worldweep.description: This trait indicates content from Children of the Worldweep.

attachedToPrismaticBrick.label: Attached To Prismatic Brick
attachedToPrismaticBrick.description: A brick is always made of sand, stone, and the grit of determination, but precious metals can be added to enhance it. A brick may only have one attachment that affects its material type. Attaching a material in this way requires at least one day, which can overlap with the time required to craft the material attachment in the first place.

description: This module contains the custom content for Worldweep, a Pathfinder 2nd Edition living world game.
